rooms.description: An open space that leads to the main living area with direct access from the garden and pool deck. Incorporates Vastu alignment for welcoming energies.
Spacious, designed for natural light and ventilation with large windows facing east to harness morning sunlight, incorporating Brutalist style concrete elements.
Adjacent to the living room with a split-level design element. Features an open kitchen integration.
Larger bedroom on the ground floor, designed for privacy and optimal orientation as per Vastu; includes built-in storage and minimalistic decor to suit a bachelor pad aesthetic.
A designated workspace with ample natural light and ventilation, integrated within the living space.
Compact room designed for occasional guests, maintaining a functional yet minimalist style.
Functional area for domestic helpers with essential facilities and ventilation as per building norms.
For storage of household items, cleaning supplies, etc.

openings.details: Large, sturdy door to ensure security while allowing sufficient natural light through adjoining windows.

openings.name: Balcony Windows
